inclusion.criterion: legally authorized representative would have been obtained prior to any study-related procedures being performed.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The subject will be assigned a screening number and will be contacted regarding eligibility once all screening procedures have been performed and laboratory results received.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: medications, including prescription, herbal/vitamins, and all over-the-counter medications)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: vital signs (sitting BP, heart rate), and a mini physical examination
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Blood will be drawn (15 cc) for full biochemistry panel with glucose (mg/dl), complete blood count, HbA1c (%), calcium (mg/dl), phosphorus (mg/dL), albumin (mg/dl), pregnancy test and 25(OH)D (ng/ml) levels.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If eligible subjects will be given an appointment and preparatory instructions for Visit 2 (Baseline/Randomization/Dose#1).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: VISIT 2 - BASELINE/ RANDOMIZATION/ STUDY DRUG DOSE#1 ADMINISTRATION.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: If subject meets all of the inclusion criteria, they will be given an appointment and preparatory instructions for Study Visit 3.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: VISIT 3 - STUDY DRUG DOSE#2 ADMINISTRATION (2 weeks after baseline).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participant will be asked about any adverse events and changes in medications, including prescription, herbal, and over-the-counter medications.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant will be given their second dose of either two 50,000 IU tablets of oral Vitamin D3 or two tablets of Placebo to take under direct observation.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Poorly controlled high blood pressure (SBP ≥160 mmHg or DBP ≥ 100 mmHg)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Screening Vitamin D (D2 and D3 level) < 5 or > 25 ng/ml
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of disease that could result in hypercalcemia
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of kidney stones (less than one year prior to screening)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of drug, alcohol, or illicit substance abuse (within the past 6 months)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of another chronic disease which the investigator feels should preclude the subject from entering the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 17 year old boy with vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. He has no other underlying disease and he is not on any medications.
